title: Valkyrie's Chaos
description: Librararian note: Older edition of B08176LB5F.As the Heir of the East Wind and Valkyrie student, Brynhild is supposed to be perfect.   But one mistake unravels everything and it isn't long before the only person she can turn to is the new Banshee teacher that doesn't speak.  One wrong choice and everything could fall apart.   **** Valkyrie's Chaos is the extended version that was available in the Magic and Mayhem anthology. Best read in order.
author: Arizona Tape
